key_talking_points: Goal scored by Sam Bennett of the Florida Panthers, assisted by Carter Verhaeghe and Gustav Forsling, puts Florida ahead 5-4 early in the first period.
Mattias Janmark of the Edmonton Oilers called for Holding the Stick. The Florida Panthers will go on the power play with 17:06 remaining in the first.
Florida's power play is looking dangerous early; will Edmonton be able to kill this penalty?
for_commentary_agent.context: The momentum score is high due to a goal and a penalty. The score is close (5-4), so maintaining Play-by-Play coverage to emphasize the tension is warranted. The penalty offers a power play opportunity, increasing the stakes.

game_context.game_situation: FLA leads by 1 in the 1st period

high_intensity_events.summary: Goal scored by Sam Bennett (FLA) at 02:07 of the first period.
Penalty on Mattias Janmark (EDM) for Holding the Stick at 02:54 of the first period.

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the Florida power play. Highlight key players and potential scoring chances. Briefly mention the impact of Janmark's absence on Edmonton's penalty kill.
